scripts.setup: npm i; npm i -g skpm; cd purescript; npm i && bower i; cd ../sketch-plugin; npm i;
scripts.build: cd purescript; npm run build; cd ../sketch-plugin; npm run build
scripts.watch: concurrently "cd purescript; npm run watch;" "cd sketch-plugin; npm start;"
scripts.clean: rm -rf ./plugin-name.sketchplugin ./node_modules; cd ./purescript; npm run clean; cd ../sketch-plugin; rm -rf ./node_modules;
scripts.start: npm run setup && npm run build;
